last_episode_to_air.name: The family looses the throne
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ludwig of Rosenborg could have been a prince. His great grandfather Crown Prince Knud was supposed to inherit the throne after his brother King Frederik IX.

name: Why is Ludwig not king?
overview: Ludwig of Rosenborg could have been the king of Denmark, had the law not been changed in 1953 to allow women to inherit the throne.
